Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Port for accessing the TVx web interface. After installation, access TVx at http://[IP]:[PORT]. Default: 8777

Config.Name: Timezone
Config.Description: Container timezone for proper EPG time display. Examples: America/New_York, Europe/London, Asia/Tokyo, etc. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones for full list.
